products.name: Organic Apples
products.description: Our organic apples are grown without the use of any synthetic pesticides or fertilizers.

products.name: Organic Eggs
products.description: Our organic eggs are laid by chickens that are raised on a diet of organic feed and have access to the outdoors.

products.name: Organic Honey
products.description: Our organic honey is produced by bees that pollinate our organic crops.

products.name: Freshly Baked Bread
products.description: Our freshly baked bread is made with organic ingredients and is baked to perfection.

products.name: Locally Grown Tomatoes
products.description: Our locally grown tomatoes are picked at the peak of ripeness and are full of flavor.

products.name: Farm Fresh Milk
products.description: Our farm fresh milk is unpasteurized and is full of nutrients.

products.name: Free Range Chicken
products.description: Our free range chicken is raised without antibiotics or hormones.

products.name: Grass Fed Beef
products.description: Our grass fed beef is raised on a diet of grass and clover.

products.name: Pasture Raised Pork
products.description: Our pasture raised pork is raised outdoors and has access to fresh air and sunshine.

products.name: Wild Caught Fish
products.description: Our wild caught fish is caught in the wild and is not farmed.

products.name: Organic Coffee Beans
products.description: Our organic coffee beans are grown without the use of any synthetic pesticides or fertilizers.

products.name: Loose Leaf Tea
products.description: Our loose leaf tea is made from high quality tea leaves and is free of artificial flavorings.

products.name: Fresh Herbs
